title: Docs: Harmonize environment ID and registration guidance across READMEs
description: Replace hard-coded IDs ('PlumeNav-v0','PlumeNav-StaticGaussian-v0') with ENV_ID import + ensure_registered(); remove 'auto-registered' phrasing; update Gymnasium examples to use ENV_ID.
design:
Background
- Current ENVIRONMENT_ID comes from src/backend/plume_nav_sim/core/constants.py (config/constants.yaml: environment_id: PlumeNav-Sim-v0).
- Registration is done via plume_nav_sim.registration.ensure_registered()/register_env(); no auto-registration on import.
- READMEs reference 'PlumeNav-v0' and 'PlumeNav-StaticGaussian-v0' inconsistently and mention auto-registration.

Scope
- Files: README.md (root), src/backend/README.md, plug-and-play-demo/README.md.
- Replace hard-coded IDs with code that imports ENV_ID and calls ensure_registered() before gym.make().
- Remove any 'auto-registered' phrasing.

Implementation notes
- Example to use in docs:
  from plume_nav_sim.registration import ensure_registered, ENV_ID
  ensure_registered()
  import gymnasium as gym
  env = gym.make(ENV_ID)
- Keep make_env() examples as-is (direct construction); clarify gym.make() needs registration.

Verification
- grep -R PlumeNav- and PlumeNav-v0 and ensure only code snippets via ENV_ID remain.
- Run a minimal script from README snippets to confirm env instantiates.
- CI/docs checks for code blocks (optional).
acceptance_criteria:
- All READMEs use ENV_ID+ensure_registered() for gym.make() examples.
- No claims of auto-registration remain.
- Hard-coded IDs (PlumeNav-v0 / PlumeNav-StaticGaussian-v0) removed from docs except within explanatory text.
- Snippets copy-paste and run to env.reset() without errors.

title: Docs: Fix reproducibility README snippet to use SeedManager.generate_episode_seed
description: Root README uses non-existent SeedManager.derive_seed(). Replace with SeedManager.generate_episode_seed(base_seed, episode_number, experiment_id). Verify snippet runs.
design:
Background
- Root README shows: SeedManager.derive_seed(...); method does not exist.
- Real API: SeedManager.generate_episode_seed(base_seed: int, episode_number: int, experiment_id: Optional[str]) -> int (utils/seeding.py).

Scope
- File: README.md (root).
- Replace derive_seed usage with generate_episode_seed(base_seed, episode_number=<int>, experiment_id="<str>").
- Keep subsequent env.reset(seed=...) example intact.

Implementation notes
- Minimal working example:
  from plume_nav_sim.utils.seeding import SeedManager
  m = SeedManager()
  s = m.generate_episode_seed(2025, episode_number=0, experiment_id="repro")
  import plume_nav_sim as pns
  env = pns.make_env()
  env.reset(seed=s)
- Ensure imports and variable names in README align with this pattern.

Verification
- Copy-paste snippet into a fresh shell: should run without AttributeError/NameError.
- Grep README for 'derive_seed' returns no matches.
acceptance_criteria: - README uses SeedManager.generate_episode_seed().\n- Example runs end-to-end: generate seed, make_env, reset with seed.\n- No references to non-existent SeedManager.derive_seed remain.
